column5: Hi all,  After watching Bunk's video was inspired to make a little Video myself...nowhere near as interesting...but fun anyway.
Hey Man, I LIKE YOUR RIDE!!!  Just ignore the donkeys that will tell ya should of bought this that or whatever negative crap they can dream up!!
Thanks for the ride Simon,brought back lots of memories,I haven't been on a sled on "the goon" for 15+ yrs. My x-wife's family owns the small island on your left at 10.20.
Nice ride Simon,,,,,but wheres the fish
